answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Lloyd, ICMA is holding the next Southeast Regional Summit in Asheville, NC at the Grove Park Inn on March 10-11, 2011.   I am working with some staffers here at ICMA to make sure it is entered in the Events Calendar and proper registration details are provided.  I will post a reply when I learn more.  Thanks.

text: I am not certain if this is the correct title for the event or not but wanted to get the date on when the next Southern "mini-conference" will be held.  Thanks.
title: ICMA Southern mini-conference
